summary.span: L’espace de noms contient les types prenant en charge le modèle d’application Visual Basic Application Model et fournissent l’accès aux informations sur les applications.

span.span: The namespace contains types that support the Visual Basic Application Model and provide access to application information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Pour plus d’informations sur le modèle d’Application Visual Basic, consultez [vue d’ensemble du modèle d’Application Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md).For more information about the Visual Basic Application Model, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md).
